pros:
Very few active buffs, only buff you need to constantly keep up is Maple Warrior
  • Most buffs are passives
Has a bind skill Spirit Trap
Has a revive Summon Other Spirit
cons:
Damage is not the highest compared to other classes
    Makes up for that with powerful utility

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: +15% + (90% when Critical Insight is active)

buffInfo.active: (Toggle),
buffInfo.buffCd: (168 - 60s cd), (120 - 100s cd), (120s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (240s cd), (180s cd), (180s cd ), (70 - 64s cd)
buffInfo.binds: (294 - 210s cd)
buffInfo.iFrame: (1800s cd revive), (120s cd), (240s cd)

build: -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Spirit Claw - Reinforce, Bush Rush and Extra Strike
  • Bomb Punch - Reinforce and Critical Chance OR Fire Fox Spirits - Reinforce and Summon Chance
    • This is purely your preference if you mob with Spirit Claw or Bomb Punch
    • If you have 100% Crit Chance you can substitute Bomb Punch - Critical Chance

primary.name: Fox Trot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20. When no enemies are around, you'll be teleported forward 300.
primary.desc: Teleports to the nearest enemy in range
details: If there are no enemies in range, you will teleport forward

primary.name: Spirit Bond 1
primary.shortDesc: Recovers 1% HP on hit.\nChance of permanently increasing Power Stance: 100%, Damage Taken: -30%

primary.name: Spirit Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Minion Duration +5%

primary.name: Swift Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Throws two quick punches forward
details: Completing the Shade storyline will upgrade to Flash Fist which deals increased %Damage

primary.name: Flash Fist
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4

primary.name: Vulpes Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, jumps ahead a certain distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Cosmic Balance
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Defense by 500, Max HP by 20%, and Max MP by 20%.

primary.name: Ground Pound
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 2\n[Shockwave]: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Speed: -40%
primary.desc: Slams down on the ground creating shockwaves
details: Can be held to continuously punch the ground
Creates a shockwave that slows nearby enemies

primary.name: Blade Imp - Downward Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 4\nBlade Imp - Trap: Final damage from Shade's attack increased by 10% for 15 sec\nCooldown: 1 sec.
primary.desc: Pulls enemies above you down to your platform and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade

primary.name: Blade Imp - Forward Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 110%, Number of Attacks: 4\nBlade Imp - Trap: Final damage from Shade's attack increased by 10% for 15 sec\nCooldown: 1 sec.
primary.desc: Pulls enemies in front of you towards you and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade

primary.name: Back Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Moves a certain distance backward.\n[Passive Effect: Avoidability: +15% permanently]
primary.desc: Dash backwards
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Avoidability

primary.name: Knuckle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Spirit Bond 2
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Attack Speed by 1 and Movement Speed by 20.

primary.name: Strength Training
primary.shortDesc: STR: +60 permanently

primary.name: Fox Spirits
primary.desc: Toggles the Fox Spirits from Fox Spirit Mastery to appear

primary.name: Fox Spirit Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Summon Chance: 10%, Number of Foxes: 1\nFox Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 1\nRepeats 2 times per attack
primary.desc: Grants a chance when attacking to summon Fox Spirits that seek and attack enemies

primary.name: Shockwave Punch
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30
[1st hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 2
[2nd hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 2
[3rd hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3
[Shockwave]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 1
primary.desc: Strikes forward 3 times. The final strike sends out a shockwave that deals additional damage

primary.name: Blade Imp - Spin Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 4\nBlade Imp - Trap: Final damage from Shade's attack increased by 10% for 15 sec\nCooldown: 1 sec
primary.desc: Spin to pull enemies behind you to in front of you and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade

primary.name: Spirit Frenzy
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 45%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Summons a flurry of spirits that spin around you dealing damage

primary.name: Spirit Trap
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 65, Trap Duration: 10 sec
Temporarily immobilizes enemies and inflicts 700% damage 3 times.
Trap Duration increased by up to 100% based on damage inflicted by Spirit Trap.
Only inflicts damage to Trapped enemies.
Cooldown: 210 sec
primary.desc: Creates a trap that binds enemies caught in it

primary.name: Spirit Bond 3
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +20%, Attack Power: +20 permanently

primary.name: Harmonious Defense
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Defense by 1500, Abnormal Status Resistance by 40, and Elemental Resistance by 40%.

primary.name: Summon Other Spirit
primary.shortDesc: Prevents KO when hit by a fatal attack, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 4, Invincibility: 3 sec\nCooldown: 1800 sec
primary.desc: When hit by a fatal attack, you will be revived, knocking by enemies and dealing damage
details: You are briefly invincible after reviving

primary.name: Weaken
primary.shortDesc: Summon Chance (per attack): 10%, Duration: 15 sec, Damage: +20%, Accuracy: -60%, Avoidability: -40%
primary.desc: When attacking enemies, you have a chance to debuff enemies
details: Enemy takes increased %Damage and has reduced %Accuracy and %Avoidability

primary.name: Bomb Punch
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20 per hit
[1st hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3
[2nd hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 310%, Number of Attacks: 3
[3rd hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 3
[4th Hit]: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 3, Stun Chance: 100%, Stun Duration: 2 sec
primary.desc: Punches several times forward
details: Has a chance to stun enemies
Can be held down to continuously keep punching

primary.name: Spirit Claw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Damage: 265%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 3
primary.desc: Cleave forward damaging enemies in front of you

primary.name: Death Mark
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 700%, Number of Critical Hits: 3\n[Mark]: Duration: 15 sec, Damage Interval: 1 sec, Damage per Interval: 250%, HP Absorb Amount: 1% of damage dealt\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Strike forward damaging and debuffing enemies in front of you
details: [Debuff]: All attacks against this target are critical hits and will restore some %Max HP. Target will also take some damage over time

primary.name: Soul Splitter
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 2000%, Number of Attacks: 1
Splits enemy souls from their bodies.
Final Damage: +20% for stationary monsters whose souls aren't split.
[Split Soul]: Shares HP with its body. Final Damage: -80%, Duration: 10 sec at the spot where attacked.
Soul Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Soul Splitter.
EXP obtained: +100% when defeating a split soul or the soul's body.
Cooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Strikes forward damaging and splitting the souls of enemies hit
details: The soul is a stationary mirror image which will deal damage to the original enemy when attacked
Grants additional EXP when defeating the soul or the original enemy

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Spirit Ward
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Duration: 30 sec, Spirits Summoned: 3, Removes debuffs or nullifies incoming damage.\nConsumes one Guardian Spirit when attacked or given a debuff.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Summons three guardian spirits that protect you from either a debuff or incoming damage
details: One Guardian Spirit is consumed after protecting you from the incoming debuff or attack

primary.name: Fire Fox Spirit Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Summon Chance: 25%, Number of Fire Fox Spirits: 1\nFire Fox Spirit Damage: 200%, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 1\nRepeats 3 times per attack
details: Increases summon chance, %Damage, and number of repeat attacks
Color of attack is changed to orange/red from blue

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Spirit Bond 4
primary.shortDesc: [Passive] Ignored Enemy DEF: +30%, Final Damage: +15%, Boss Damage: +30%

primary.name: Advanced Knuckle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +70%, Critical Damage: +20%, Final Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Crit Damage and %Final Damage

primary.name: Critical Insight
primary.shortDesc: When an enemy goes below 50% HP, your Critical Rate increases by 75% and your Critical Damage increases by 20%\nPermanently increases your Critical Rate by 25%.

hyperActive.name: Spirit Bond Max
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 30 sec, Damage: +35%, Attack Power: +20, When Attacking Boss Monsters - Damage: +20%, Increases Attack Speed by 1 stage, Enemy DEF Ignored: 20%\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Increases %Damage, %Boss Damage, %Ignore DEF and Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and grants flat Attack
details: At Lv. 200 you can complete a questline to enhance this skill

hyperActive.name: Spirit Bond Max
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Duration: 30, Damage: +35%, Attack Power: +20, Boss Attack Damage: +20%, Attack speed increased by 1, Enemy DEF ignored: 20%, summons Moonbeam spirit guardian
Cooldown: 120 sec
Liver Memory Chance (on attack): 10%, Spirit Bond Max Duration: +x sec, doesn't increase past the Spirit Bond Max cooldown.
The summoned Spirit Guardian uses the below skills on its own:
Liver Circle Dance: Attacks up to 6 enemies with 275% damage 3 times, Cooldown: 3 sec
Spirit Frenzy: Attacks up to 10 enemies with 150% damage, Duration: 4.8 sec, Shade's Spirit Frenzy Final Damage (while Spirit Guardian is using Spirit Frenzy): +700%, Cooldown: 60 sec
Spirit Ward: Uses Spirit Ward again when Spirit Guardian is not at max due to Shade's Spirit Ward, Cooldown: 100 sec
hyperActive.desc: Increases %Damage, %Boss Damage, %Ignore DEF and Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and grants flat Attack
details: When attacking there is a chance to drop Livers that increase the duration of Spirit Bond Max

There will also be a summoned Spirit Guardian that will attack with you:
  • [Liver Circle Dance]: The Spirit Guardian will attack nearby enemies
  • [Spirit Frenzy]: The Spirit Guardian will cast a smaller version of
  • [Spirit Ward]: The Spirit Guardian uses on Shade as long as is not already active

hyperActive.name: Spirit Incarnation
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 1\nLasts while key is held down, Max Duration: 8 sec\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Transform into an invincible spirit that attacks enemies in a large area

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

fifthMain.name: Spirit Flow
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, resets cooldowns, Duration: 55, the spirits guiding you automatically trigger an attack skill when you perform an attack, excluding 5th Job Skills, when you perform an attack, Key-down Skill Durations: 3 sec, Final Damage: +17%\nSpirit Attack Cooldown: 2 Sec.\nCooldown: 120 Sec.
fifthMain.desc: Whenever you attack, spirits will automatically appear and attack alongside you
details: The spirits come from your skills from all Job Advancements except 5th Job
Also resets all cooldowns for skills that apply and increases %Final Damage when active

fifthMain.name: Spiritgate
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 40 sec, Creates a portal that summons 2 spirits lasting 8 sec. Up to 10 spirits can exist simultaneously.
Spirits seek out nearby enemies to inflict 600% damage 6 times. Spirits then collide with the enemy, disappearing and granting them a debuff for 8 sec.
Attacks against an afflicted enemy gain Critical Rate +8% and Critical Damage +1%.Debuff can stack up to 10 times.
Cooldown: 95 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a portal where swarms of spirits will appear and seek out enemies to attack and debuff
details:
[Debuff]: Attacks to this enemy will have increased %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage
  • The effects of the debuff can stack (up to 10 times)

fifthMain.name: True Spirit Claw
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 8, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: 50%\nActivates when Spirit Claw is used\nCooldown: 6 sec
fifthMain.desc: Periodically when using , the true form of the skill will appear, attacking enemies in a bigger radius
details: The skill also gains additional %Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Smashing Multipunch
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60. Consecutively attacks up to 10 enemies with 800% damage 5 time(s) during key-down.
Max Key-down Time: 1.3 sec
Upon end of key-down, a final shock attack that attacks 10 enemies with 1900% damage 15 time(s) is activated 3 time(s). Upon successful hits of the final attack, 15 additional Fox Spirits are summoned.
During Smashing Multipunch, any attacks that inflict damage proportional to Max HP will suffer a -50% penalty to damage. Fox Spirits have a 100% chance to appear upon each successful hit.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Furiously punches forward before smashing down for a final attack
details: The final attack creates a shockwave attack and summons several where the smash lands
Each punch has a guaranteed chance to summon a
While casting, you gain increased %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks

meta: Shade is STR pirate class part of the Heroes class group. Shade is known for their tanky nature and few buffs to manage. Shade also has several utility skills that benefit parties and bosses greatly
